test
module test #(
parameter 
ADDRESS_WIDTH
 = 
32,
parameter 
BUS_WIDTH
 = 
4
) ( input clk, input rstn, inout up_rreq, inout up_rack, inout [ADDRESS_WIDTH-(BUS_WIDTH/2)-1:0] up_raddr, inout [(BUS_WIDTH*8)-1:0] up_rdata, inout up_wreq, inout up_wack, inout [ADDRESS_WIDTH-(BUS_WIDTH/2)-1:0] up_waddr, inout [(BUS_WIDTH*8)-1:0] up_wdata )

Test bench loop for up

Parameters
ADDRESS_WIDTH
parameter

Width of the uP address port, max 32 bit.

BUS_WIDTH
parameter

Width of the uP bus data port.

Ports
clk

Clock for all devices in the core

rstn

Negative reset

up_rreq

uP bus read request

up_rack

uP bus read ack

up_raddr

uP bus read address

up_rdata

uP bus read data

up_wreq

uP bus write request

up_wack

uP bus write ack

up_waddr

uP bus write address

up_wdata

uP bus write data
